title: Rovers edge Westhill in 2–1 away thriller
excerpt: A late header from captain Sean Doyle sealed the points after a battling display at Westhill.

title: U14s claim Community Cup!
excerpt: Huge congratulations to our Under‑14s who lifted the cup after a penalty shootout at Portland Park.

title: New floodlights installed at Portland Park
excerpt: The upgrade brings brighter, more energy‑efficient lighting ahead of the winter schedule.
